Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2013 11:59PM - edited Mar 7, 2013 10:27PM by Moderators Mariar... Mine is a unique situation. I'm a male with stage 3a cancer diagnosis. I was diagnosed on May 11th. I had unilateral MX with sentinel node biopsy. 7/14 pos nodes, ER/PR+, HER2NEU- I remember those feelings. I had 6 sessions of chemo afterthe MX and then 25 rounds of daily rads. I'm now on Tamoxifen. So far so good. I wish you luck. If anyone wants to reach me I can be reached by Private Message. Best always, Bob Edited by Mods to remove member's private email address.
Posts.Title: stage 3a breast cancer survivors mariar Icandoallthings
